todos.content: Implement backend auth service + JWT handling (Google token verify, auth router)
todos.background: Goal 4: Google OAuth Login backend pieces.
suggested_solutions: Add auth_service.py to verify Google token using google-auth, issue JWT with 24h expiry, integrate auth_router endpoints, update API router registration and settings for JWT/Google client ID.

todos.content: Implement frontend login flow (LoginPage, useAuth, auth store, router guard)
todos.background: Goal 4: Google OAuth Login frontend pieces.
suggested_solutions: Create LoginPage with GIS button, Pinia auth store, composable, router guard, token persistence, update request.js to attach token.

todos.content: Ensure health endpoint acceptance criteria + tests are marked complete
todos.background: Cleanup goal list and confirm tests.
suggested_solutions: Run pytest for health check and mark todo once passing.

todos.content: Install pytest in backend environment to run tests
